document.title: Combinatorial and Relational Network as a Toolkit for Dutch Languag...
document.intro: Cornetto (Combinatorial and Relational Network as a Toolkit for Dutch Language Technology) is a lexical database for Dutch, containing semantic relations and combinatorial information, with links to the English Wordnet. The lexicon contains 92,000 lemmata corresponding with 118,000 word...
